```{r init, echo=FALSE, fig.height=3, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(reshape2)

#project.id <- 'tools.pdt'
file.evol = paste("", project.id, "_mls_evol.csv", sep="")
evol <- read.csv(file=file.evol, header=T)
evol <- evol[cumsum(abs(evol$sent_response + evol$senders_init + evol$senders_response 
                        + evol$sent + evol$threads + evol$repositories 
                        + evol$senders )) != 0 & complete.cases(evol),]

evol.i <- data.frame(seq(1:nrow(evol)), evol[,c('date', 'sent_response','senders_init', 'senders_response', 'sent', 'threads', 'repositories', 'senders')])
names(evol.i)[1] <- 'index'

p <- plot_ly(data=evol.i, x=~index, y=~senders_init, text= ~paste('Date: ', date), 
		name="Senders Init", type='scatter', mode='lines', width=800, height=350)  %>% 
	add_trace(y=~sent_response, name='Sent Response', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~senders_response, name='Senders Response', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~sent, name='Sent', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~threads, name='Threads', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~repositories, name='Repositories', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~senders, name='Senders', mode='lines') %>%
    layout(autosize = F,
		yaxis = list( title = "Value" ))
p
```
